title: TRP and Classified’s New Groupset Is 1×16. Can It Challenge SRAM, Shimano, Campy?
content:
The TRP VISTAR // Powershift brings Classified's two-speed hub gearing to a fully-integrated groupset, allowing a 1x16 shifting system.

Read the full article at TRP and Classified’s New Groupset Is 1×16. Can It Challenge SRAM, Shimano, Campy? on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
